name: Antaeus
description:
Antaeus

UPDATED

If you like driving than you're probably going to like this game. Basically now it's just an unfinished driving game with no defined mission. Just enjoy driving the pickup truck around the track, maybe try to do some drifting or tricks because the car is capable of that. 

If you decide to try it you are AWESOME. 

If you don't know it already, since the game is free you can use the game assets for your own projects. If you are a developer and you need some of the assets just let me know and you'll have them for free.
What's new?
  • Different car setups (original, drift, offroad)
  • Added bridges, ramp, and wall ride
  • More parts of the map are accessible
  • Easter Eggs
  • Added more vegetation and rocks
  • Small fixes

Read Devlog for more information about "what's new?" and Easter Eggs.

Boring stuff about self promotion

Save yourself some time and don't read it.

If you'd like to SHARE it with friends and maybe follow me on my social media to see the development process. A huge project is coming and you can see behind the scenes.  You can follow my Instagram for that. If you read this my strategy is working but I highly doubt it.
